name: obsidian-smart-composer (glowingjade)
description: [项目级] AI chat assistant for Obsidian with contextual awareness, smart writing assistance, and one-click edits. Features vault-aware conversations, semantic search, and local model support.。来源: https://github.com/glowingjade/obsidian-smart-composer

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
AI chat assistant for Obsidian with contextual awareness, smart writing assistance, and one-click edits. Features vault-aware conversations, semantic search, and local model support.

来源: https://github.com/glowingjade/obsidian-smart-composer
语言: TypeScript
Stars: 2111

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content:
> [!IMPORTANT]
> **Installer Version Requirement**  
> Smart Composer requires a recent version of the Obsidian installer. If you experience issues with the plugin not loading properly:
> 
> 1. First, try updating Obsidian normally at `Settings > General > Check for updates`.
> 
> 2. If issues persist, manually update your Obsidian installer:
>    - Download the latest installer from [Obsidian's download page](https://obsidian.md/download)
>    - Close Obsidian completely
>    - Run the new installer

1. Open Obsidian Settings
2. Navigate to "Community plugins" and click "Browse"
3. Search for
